channel.title: Project Insanity weapon anim
channel.description:
Well..I'm messing around on a source, and I noticed that every time the chaotic rapier attacks somebody, it does the vls spec animation. I want to remove it, so I went to combatassistant.java, and tried to find the rapier's attack emote, but it wasn't in there? I tried adding it in manually to do the normal attack emote, but it still always does vls special.
I'm all out of ideas anybody know where the heck the server is telling chaotic rapier to do the vls emote?

item.title: Project Insanity weapon anim
item.dc:creator: @xtylerr xtylerr
item.description:

It uses the spec animation every time.
